fields_of_interest: Culture and media, Culture, Single market, Digital economy and society, Communication
eu_initiatives:
- EC Collective Rights Management Directive 
- EC Term of Protection Directive
organisation_name: AUDIOGEST - Associação Para a Gestão e Distribuição de Direitos (AUDIOGEST)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
- AUDIOGEST is a member of IFPI - International Federation of Phonographic Industry 
 
- AUDIOGEST is a member of the informal organization "Forum para a Protecção de Direitos Autorais e Gestão Colectiva nos Países de Lingua Portuguesa" an organization to promote IP rights of authors, producers and performers on the Portuguese speakers countries.
